sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Box, Grid, Card, Typography, Avatar, Button, Divider
} from "@mui/material";
import ShoppingCartIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ShoppingCart";
import WalletIcon from "@mui/icons-material/AccountBalanceWallet";
import StarIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Star";

// Styles for cards
const cardStyle = {
  p: 3,
  borderRadius: 2.5,
  boxShadow: 4,
  bgcolor: "#fff",
  height: "110px",
  display: "flex",
  alignItems: "center",
  justifyContent: "flex-start"
};

const UserDashboard = () => (
  <Box sx={{
    bgcolor: "#fff5f7",
    minHeight: "100vh",
    width: "100vw",
    overflow: "hidden"
  }}>
    {/* Header */}
    <Box
      sx={{
        bgcolor: "#e23744",
        color: "#fff",
        pt: 4, pb: 4,
        px: 8,
        borderRadius: "0 0 28px 28px",
        boxShadow: 2,
        display: "flex",
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        width: "100%",
        minHeight: 130,
        mb: 7
      }}
    >
      <Box display="flex" alignItems="center">
        <Avatar
          sx={{
            width: 78,
            height: 78,
            bgcolor: "#fff",
            color: "#e23744",
            fontWeight: 700,
            fontSize: 34,
            mr: 3
          }}
        >
          U
        </Avatar>
        <Box>
          <Typography variant="h4" fontWeight={900}
            sx={{ letterSpacing: 1, mb: .5 }}>
            Welcome, [User Name]!
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1"
            fontWeight={500} sx={{ opacity: .93 }}>
            Doorstep fuel delivery, made easy.
          </Typography>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      <Button
        variant="contained"
        sx={{
          bgcolor: "#fff",
          color: "#e23744",
          borderRadius: 99,
          px: 6,
          py: 1.3,
          fontWeight: 700,
          boxShadow: 1,
          fontSize: 18,
          '&:hover': { bgcolor: "#ffb0b9" }
        }}
      >
        MY ACCOUNT
      </Button>
    </Box>
    {/* Info Row - No Scrolling, All Horizontal */}
    <Box sx={{
      display: "flex",
      justifyContent: "center",
      alignItems: "flex-start",
      width: "100%",
      maxWidth: "1400px",
      margin: "0 auto",
      gap: 4,
      mb: 5
    }}>
      {/* Loyalty */}
      <Card sx={{ ...cardStyle, minWidth: 300 }}>
        <StarIcon sx={{ color: "#e23744", fontSize: 40, mr: 2 }} />
        <Box>
          <Typography variant="subtitle1"
            fontWeight={700} sx={{ color: "#e23744", opacity: 0.8 }}>
            Available Loyalty
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h5" fontWeight={900}>₹0</Typography>
        </Box>
      </Card>
      {/* Wallet */}
      <Card sx={{ ...cardStyle, minWidth: 300 }}>
        <WalletIcon sx={{ color: "#e23744", fontSize: 40, mr: 2 }} />
        <Box>
          <Typography variant="subtitle1"
            fontWeight={700} sx={{ color: "#e23744", opacity: 0.8 }}>
            My Wallet Limit
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h5" fontWeight={900}>₹0</Typography>
        </Box>
      </Card>
      {/* Cart */}
      <Card sx={{ ...cardStyle, minWidth: 300 }}>
        <ShoppingCartIcon sx={{ color: "#e23744", fontSize: 40, mr: 2 }} />
        <Box>
          <Typography variant="subtitle1"
            fontWeight={700} sx={{ color: "#e23744", opacity: 0.8 }}>
            Cart Status
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h5" fontWeight={900}>Active</Typography>
        </Box>
      </Card>
    </Box>
    <Divider sx={{ my: 4, maxWidth: 1400, margin: "0 auto" }} />
    {/* Data Row - Orders & Assets */}
    <Box sx={{
      display: "flex",
      justifyContent: "center",
      alignItems: "flex-start",
      width: "100%",
      maxWidth: "950px",
      margin: "0 auto",
      gap: 4
    }}>
      {/* Last 5 Orders */}
      <Card sx={{
        borderRadius: 2,
        boxShadow: 3,
        p: 3,
        bgcolor: "#fff",
        flex: 1,
        minWidth: 350,
        height: 180
      }}>
        <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight={900}
          sx={{ letterSpacing: 1, color: "#e23744" }}>
          My Last 5 Orders
        </Typography>
        <Divider sx={{ mb: 2 }} />
        <Typography sx={{ opacity: 0.7 }}>No records found</Typography>
      </Card>
      {/* Assets */}
      <Card sx={{
        borderRadius: 2,
        boxShadow: 3,
        p: 3,
        bgcolor: "#fff",
        flex: 1,
        minWidth: 350,
        height: 180
      }}>
        <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight={900}
          sx={{ letterSpacing: 1, color: "#e23744" }}>
          My Assets
        </Typography>
        <Divider sx={{ mb: 2 }} />
        <Typography sx={{ opacity: 0.7 }}>No records found</Typography>
      </Card>
    </Box>
    {/* Footer note (optional, add if needed) */}
    {/* <Box sx={{ textAlign: "center", mt: 8, color: "#aaa" }}>
      © 2025 Your Company. All rights reserved.
    </Box> */}
  </Box>
);

export default UserDashboard;
